dialogueSegments.text: Rose! Is that you? I finally opened my own restaurant!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: That you did little guy. You’re all grown up now. Brewing your first coffee as well I see.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Rose

dialogueSegments.text: Yeah! Wanna try it? Your restaurant always had the best coffee.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: If you insist, little guy. Let’s give this brew a shot.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Rose

dialogueSegments.text: Chef! What is this? Did you even filter it?! I can still taste the crust!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Rose

dialogueSegments.text: Is that not how you brew coffee?
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: No, Chef. You have to tailor every order to the customer! No two customers are the same, you know.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Rose

dialogueSegments.text: I see! So I can’t just use the same technique every time?
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: That’s right Chef, you’re a quick learner! Now please, go out and try again! I’ll be waiting!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Rose

bestEnding.text: Here you go Rose, how I’d do?
bestEnding.speaker: Chef

bestEnding.text: Hmmm. Much better than last time Chef! But you’ve got a long way to go! Don’t get lazy.
bestEnding.speaker: Rose

bestEnding.text: Of course not! This cafe’ll be in tip-top shape next time you’re here.
bestEnding.speaker: Chef

bestEnding.text: Careful Chef, I’m gonna hold you to that standard! I’ve got to get back to work, but I’ll be back!
bestEnding.speaker: Rose

bestEnding.text: I’ll see you around Rose. Thanks again!
bestEnding.speaker: Chef

goodEnding.text: Here you go Rose. How’s this one?
goodEnding.speaker: Chef

goodEnding.text: It’s… passable I suppose. If you want the Seventino Midnight Cafe to be bustling with people, you’re gonna have to try a little harder Chef.
goodEnding.speaker: Rose

goodEnding.text: How do I do that? I’m trying my hardest already!
goodEnding.speaker: Chef

goodEnding.text: I know little guy. You gotta make each coffee exactly how the customer likes it! Temper it to their expectations, and they’ll be coming back for more!
goodEnding.speaker: Rose

goodEnding.text: I see. So everyone is going to want their coffee a little differently?
goodEnding.speaker: Chef

goodEnding.text: Exactly! Keep that attitude up and I’m sure you’ll succeed. I’ve got to get back to work at my own restaurant, so I’ll be back later to check on your progress. Cya later Chef!
goodEnding.speaker: Rose

goodEnding.text: Bye Rose! Thank you again. Your next coffee will be phenomenal!
goodEnding.speaker: Chef
